mapper.select: select a.ext_id,a.str_class_date,a.end_class_date, c.user_name from ext_info a, app_class b, user_info c where a.ext_id=b.ext_id and a.user_id=c.user_id and b.user_id=#{user_id} and b.reg_stus="결제완료" and a.end_class_date > now()

select a.ext_id,a.str_class_date,a.end_class_date, c.user_name from ext_info a, app_class b, user_info c where a.ext_id=b.ext_id and a.user_id=c.user_id and b.user_id=#{user_id} and b.reg_stus="결제완료" and a.end_class_date < now()
select c.user_name,b.reg_stus,b.reg_date,a.ext_id from ext_info a, app_class b, user_info c where a.ext_id=b.ext_id and a.user_id=c.user_id and b.user_id=#{user_id}
select * from stu_info where ext_id=#{ext_id} and user_id=#{user_id}

mapper.delete: delete from stu_info where ext_id=#{ext_id} and user_id=#{user_id} and post_date=#{post_date}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, m.sent_time, m.msg_cont, m.addr_id from msg_rec m, user_info u where m.user_id = u.user_id and addr_id = #{user_id};
select c.* from app_class a, ext_info b, user_info c where a.ext_id = b.ext_id and a.user_id = c.user_id and a.ext_id=#{ext_id}
mapper.insert: insert into carrer (carrer_id, att_file, carrer_name, agen_name, user_id,subject) value(#{carrer_id},#{att_file},#{carrer_name},#{agen_name},#{user_id},#{subject})
mapper.select: select carrer_id from carrer where user_id = #{user_id} order by carrer_id desc limit 1
select * from carrer where user_id=#{user_id} and subject is not null
select * from carrer where user_id=#{user_id} and subject is null
